<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Control Tower](/Feats.aspx?ID=3125) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Overwatch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=109)

**Prerequisites**
[Overwatch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3118); master in Perception

</column>

---

Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action to find [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.
name: Control Tower
